author: .vbuterin
content: I'm intentionally trying really hard to make the "interface" for the verkle tree a blind key/value map

author: .vbuterin
content: Or at least as close to one as practically possible

author: .vbuterin
content: child counting would make that really hard

author: .vbuterin
content: And it's also incompatible with the current design where storage is scattered throughout the tree
